patterns: When are the admissions going to start?
When is the commencement of new session?
When is the new batch starting?
responses: The session usually starts in September and admission for the same begins from July.
July marks the begining of admisssion process for new session.

patterns: Can I pay fees using credit card?
What type of payments do you accept?
CAn I pay using debit card?
Can I pay with UPI?
Can I pay with cash?
Is cash acceptable for fees?
Do you take fees via UPI?
responses: We accept UPI, Cash, Credit card, Debit Card
We accept most major credit and debit card and also Cash and UPI.

patterns: When does the booking for hostel begins?
When does the hostel available for boys?
When does the hostel is available for girls?
responses: Hostel booking are available from month of March-April for both boys and girls.
Bookings for hostels begin in March and ends nearly in April.

patterns: What are the courses available in GEHU?
Courses in GEHU
What are the courses?
what are the variety of courses GEHU sell?
responses: We provide Batchelors in Computer Science, Business Studies , Law , Commerce , Science , Information Technology, Engineering and many more...
You can check this is on the website https://www.gehu.ac.in/content/gehu/en/about.html

patterns: What is the placement in GEHU?
How many students are placed this session?
What is the average number of students placed?
How many companies visited the campus?
How many startups visits the campus?
responses: There are 200+ companies who visits the campus of GEHU every year. More on the website https://www.gehu.ac.in/content/gehu/en/placement.html
You can check this is on the website https://www.gehu.ac.in/content/gehu/en/placements.html

patterns: What is the average package in this session?
What is the hishest package?
What is the lowest package this session?

responses: Highest package => 44.14 LPA , Average package => 5.75 LPA , Lowest package => 3.25LPA
You can find the relevant details here https://www.gehu.ac.in/content/gehu/en/placements.html
This can be found here https://www.gehu.ac.in/content/gehu/en/placements.html
